title: Paolo Heusch's THE DAY THE SKY EXPLODED (1958) HQ

sources.title: Paolo Heusch's THE DAY THE SKY EXPLODED (1958) HQ
sources.description: aka "La morte viene dallo spazio", a sheaper italian remake of George Pal's production of "When Worlds Collide" (1951). The Cinematography is made by none other than Mario Bava (wrongly spelled "Fava" here). The music is by Carlo Rustichelli. more info on http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0051951/
